name: Hentai Nation
description:
Hentai Nation will let you enjoy the company of many girls while you relax and complete challenging puzzles.

You can pick any Scene, Girl or Puzzle and have unlimited fun.

There's also the Challenges game mode, with increasing difficulty, so you can test your skills.

The best part is the prize after you complete a puzzle, you can enjoy the scenes and the girls moving the camera anywhere you want!

Workshop support will keep you entertained for many hours! Download the girls and scenes made by the community!
